english.segment1: Lead me guide me . Stay right beside me . Lead me guide me . Stay right beside me . Lead me guide me . Stay right beside me Lord . Lord I want to know you more . Lord I want to know you. . To feel your heart and know your mind . Looking in your eyes stirs up within me . Cries that say I want to know you . Lord I want to know you more. . Lord I want to know you more . Deep within my soul I want to know you . Lord I want to know you
english.segment2: To feel your heart and know your mind . Looking in your eyes stirs up within me . Cries that say I want to know you . Lord I want to know you more. . Lead me guide me . Stay right beside me . Lead me guide me . Stay right beside me . Lead me guide me . Stay right beside me Lord . Lord I want to know you more . Lord I want to know you more
